review.title: “Company culture reflects nepotism and religious zealotry.”
review.pros: Pros – If you are related to someone that already works there or share in their religious views...you can wear whatever title you like, and draw a good salary for non-performance.
review.cons: Cons – The home office is a self-contained environment where your every move is strictly controlled and monitored. Do not think about eating off-site or even filling up your car with gas nearby in the City of Dearborn. That will be considered treason.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company
